solution_line_template: From 8:00 to 11:00, Mckenna spends {office_end_time}:00-{start_time}:00 = {office_hours} hours at work
When she joins the developers in the conference room for the meeting, she spends an additional {meeting_end_time}:00-{meeting_start_time}:00 = {meeting_hours} hours at work.
So far, she has spent {office_hours}+{meeting_hours} = <<{office_hours}+{meeting_hours}={hours_so_far}>>{hours_so_far} hours at work.

When she works for an additional {additional_hours} hours before heading home, her total work hours become {hours_so_far}+{additional_hours} = <<{hours_so_far}+{additional_hours}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours
